metadata.title: CVE-2023-0210 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A bug affects the Linux kernelâ€™s ksmbd NTLMv2 authentication and is knownto crash the OS immediately in Linux-based systems.
